abilities.name: Protective Wall
abilities.effect: Prevent all damage done to your Benched Pokémon by your opponent’s attacks.

attacks.name: Anger Revenge
attacks.effect: If Bastiodon was damaged by an attack during your opponent’s last turn, this attack does 40 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Feint
attacks.effect: This attack’s damage isn’t affected by Resistance.

attacks.name: Aura Sphere
attacks.effect: Does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Call for Family
attacks.effect: Search your deck for a Basic Pokémon and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Aqua Ring
attacks.effect: Switch Manaphy with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Minor Errand-Running
attacks.effect: Search your deck for a basic Energy card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Thunder Jolt
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, Pachirisu does 10 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Assurance
attacks.effect: As long as the Defending Pokémon’s remaining HP is 60 or less, this attack’s base damage is 60 instead of 30.

attacks.name: Hasty Headbutt
attacks.effect: Rampardos does 20 damage to itself. This attack’s damage isn’t affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poké-Powers, Poké-Bodies, or any other effects on the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Blowing Wind
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, put 1 of your Benched Pokémon and all cards attached to it on top of your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Ominous Wind
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused and can’t retreat during your opponent’s next turn.

attacks.name: Surprise Attack
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Wild Kick
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Spark
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage to 2 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Whirlwind
attacks.effect: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Clutch
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon can’t retreat during your opponent’s next turn.

attacks.name: Amnesia
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of the Defending Pokémon’s attacks. That Pokémon can’t use that attack during your opponent’s next turn.

attacks.name: Scavenge
attacks.effect: Search your discard pile for a Trainer card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand.

attacks.name: Jump Kick
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Sleep Powder
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Leech Seed
attacks.effect: If this attack does any damage to the Defending Pokémon (after applying Weakness and Resistance), remove 1 damage counter from Cherubi.

attacks.name: Ember
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, discard a Fire Energy attached to Chimchar.

attacks.name: Water Splash
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 10 more damage.

attacks.name: Quick Attack
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage.
